name: GoUpward
0:
”Alexa, start go upward”
”What is new at Upward”
”what is up”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: go upward
des:
Using a website dashboard, the Upward team can send messages to client regarding their associated services such as websites, customer service, development and more.

The client can register by telling the Skill who they are and the Upward team can then send them messages and alerts through an internal dashbaord. These alerts can be played by asking the skill "What's up?" or "What's new?"
